rows.label: qev051302_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello. How's business?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0002
rows.name:
Quite excellent, I should think.
...Or it's about to be, at any rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0003
rows.name: Now let's have those keys you've collected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0004
rows.name:
Mmm... That is not a key. But what of the others?
You have the other three, do you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Is something wrong? Your contract was to gather all
four of the keys. You have them, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0006
rows.name: Then please give the other three to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0007
rows.name: A moment, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0008
rows.name: Hmm? What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have learned something of critical importance about
this person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0010
rows.name: Oh? Let's hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0011
rows.name: It concerns the four keys you seek.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0012
rows.name:
It seems this person held three of them from the very
beginning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0013
rows.name: What...? But how is that possible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0014
rows.name:
It means that the one responsible for stealing the keys
from the Celeste Three...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0015
rows.name:
The one who murdered your comrade Fosdyke and the
others stands before you now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0016
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_JNK0010
rows.name: Berate

rows.label: qev051302_SEL0011
rows.name: Shout at Ga Bewhe for betraying you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_JNK0020
rows.name: Reel

rows.label: qev051302_SEL0021
rows.name:
Stand agape at the revelation that
Adolphus was the fourth man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_JNK0030
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: qev051302_SEL0031
rows.name:
Explain that you fought the Celeste Three in self-defense
after they deceived and attacked you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0017
rows.name: Do not listen to this villain's lies, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0018
rows.name:
I care not for [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] explanations, Ga Bewhe.
But if this one killed Fosdyke and the others,
[ST:gender p1=he's p2=she's ] stronger than we'd thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0019
rows.name: You need not worry, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'm more shocked than you, I promise.
What are the chances of hiring their murderer?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0021
rows.name:
Still, that means you're tougher than I'd anticipated.
Which requires a change of plans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0022
rows.name: You need not worry, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0023
rows.name:
Greed makes the most clever liars. If it weren't for you,
that white gold would already be mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0024
rows.name: Now it is your turn to be murdered for those keys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0025
rows.name: Not necessary, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0026
rows.name: I already have them in my possession.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0027
rows.name: Hah! Excellent work, Ga Bewhe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0028
rows.name:
But wait. If you already have them, you must have
known this BLADE was in possession of the keys
when first you brought [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0029
rows.name: That is correct, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0030
rows.name:
And it would appear everything's gone according to
your plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0031
rows.name: I apologize for keeping it from you until now, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0032
rows.name:
It doesn't matter. As long as I have all four keys,
NOTHING else matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0033
rows.name: ...Hmm? You seem confused, my good BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0034
rows.name: Ah, yes. The fourth key. Of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0035
rows.name: It's been in my possession this whole time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0036
rows.name:
Withholding that bit and telling you to find four was
just a bit of insurance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0037
rows.name:
Though it did mean having Ga Bewhe send you on a
ridiculous wild-goose chase for a fake key I passed
on to some BLADE sap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0038
rows.name: Heh heh... Ha ha! Aaaah ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0039
rows.name: Ga Bewhe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0040
rows.name:
Now that the keys are ours, we have no further need
of our friend here. You may dispose of [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0041
rows.name: As you wish, master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0042
rows.name: You certainly are...strong...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0043
rows.name:
But I no longer have a reason to risk my life here.
Farewell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0044
rows.name: What?! No! Wait, you coward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0045
rows.name: This fight is not over, Ga Bewhe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0046
rows.name:
The murderer who stole the keys from us stands there
pointing [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] weapon at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0047
rows.name: I forbid you from running![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0048
rows.name: W-wait... Please... We can talk about this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0049
rows.name: We...we have all four keys now! Yes, that's it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0050
rows.name:
We can get through that door and split the white gold
between us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0051
rows.name:
That was the initial agreement, right?
No need for anyone to come out worse for the deal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0052
rows.name:
With the Wrothian woman who lied to us gone,
there's no reason we can't put all this behind us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0053
rows.name:
We'll go open the vault right now. I'm sure your mood
will improve as soon as you see all that white gold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0054
rows.name: It's open...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0055
rows.name: It's all ours! All the white gold inside is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0056
rows.name: ...GONE?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0057
rows.name: It's empty! EMPTY![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0058
rows.name: But how is that possible?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0059
rows.name: Someone would've had to get in before us and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0060
rows.name: That Wrothian cur![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0061
rows.name: ...Heh. Aaaaah ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0062
rows.name: Aaaaaaaaah ha ha ha ha ha ha haa![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0063
rows.name: It was after she'd taken your keys![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0064
rows.name:
She must have taken mine while you were off searching
and I was waiting for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0065
rows.name:
With all four keys in her possession,
she emptied the vault![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0066
rows.name:
Then the only reason she waited was to fight you.
Probably hoping to eliminate pursuit before it even
started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0067
rows.name: That conniving beast...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0068
rows.name: She completely outplayed me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0069
rows.name: Ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0070
rows.name: Bwa ha ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051302_MSG0071
rows.name: BWAAAA HA HA HA HA HA HA HAAAAAAAAAAA![ST:wait ]
